name: Shadows Unveiled: Agnes
description:
"Shadows Unveiled: Agnes" is an immersive horror experience that plunges the player into a dark and chilling narrative. In the role of a brave exorcist, the player is summoned to investigate the mystery behind an ancient abandoned apartment, known as Sancta Lux, where the nun Agnes Kolarova performed obscure rituals before her inexplicable death.

While exploring the sinister corridors and decadent rooms of the apartment, players will uncover dark secrets and face unimaginable horrors as they try to unravel the truth behind the disturbing events plaguing the location.

With a chilling atmosphere and detailed graphics, "Shadows Unveiled: Agnes" offers an immersive horror experience that will challenge even the bravest players. Get ready to dive into a world of nightmares and uncover the dark secrets that await in the darkness.

In Shadows Unveiled, Agnes is a first-person, contemplative game where the player will have to solve puzzles to find ways to progress in the game. In dark environments, use flashlights or lighters. What will be Agnes's true secret?

The game is currently in early access. At this time, we provide the first part of the story for you players. The complete mystery will be unveiled at the official launch.
